item.title: Hong Kong Stock Exchange: Guotai Junan International's intraday stock price surged by more than 23%, and its cryptocurrency trading service has officially launched.
item.description: August 29th. Based on market data, the Hong Kong-listed Cathay Pacific Guosen International (01788.HK) opened with a gain of more than 23% and is currently up 16%, with a trading volume of 4.4 billion Hong Kong dollars. During the day, other cryptocurrency-related stocks strengthened. OSL Group (00863.HK) rose by more than 7.5%, while Huajian Healthcare (01931.HK) and Kingway Investment (01328.HK) both rose by more than 4%.Yesterday, Cathay Pacific Guosen International announced the official launch of cryptocurrency trading services. Clients with cryptocurrency accounts can trade various coins such as BTC, ETH, AVAX, LINK, and SOL. Clients with professional investor qualifications can further choose to trade XRP, USDT, USDC, and other coins. In addition, clients can use the Cathay Pacific Guosen Securities (Hong Kong) securities trading service to allocate idle funds that have not been invested in the cryptocurrency market to the Cathay Pacific Guosen International "Wealth Management

item.title: Ethereum PoS Network Exit Queue Decreases to around 1.058 Million ETH, Entry Queue Increases to around 735,000 ETH
item.description: On August 29th, according to the data from the Validator Queue tracking website validatorqueue, the current exit queue of the Ethereum PoS network is temporarily reported to be 1,058,531 ETH. Based on the current price, the ETH exiting the PoS network is approximately $47.47 billion, and the withdrawal delay is currently reported as 18 days and 9 hours.At the same time, the demand for staking by new validators has increased. The admission queue for today has risen to 735,126 ETH, which is worth around $32.9 billion, and the current queuing time for admission is 12 days and 18 hours.

item.title: Sharps Technology to Increase Fundraising to $1 Billion and Launch Digital Asset Treasury Strategy
item.description: On August 29th, as reported by PRNewswire, the Nasdaq-listed company Sharps Technology announced that the private placement of common stock and warrants had been completed. In this transaction, more than $400 million was raised. If all the warrants are exercised, an additional $600 million can be obtained, making the total fundraising amount reach $1 billion. The new funds will support its digital asset treasury strategy, with the main holding of the treasury being SOL.

item.title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index currently at 50, indicating a "Neutral" market status
item.description: On August 29th, based on alternative data, the Fear and Greed Index of cryptocurrencies today is 50 (yesterday it was 48), suggesting that the market remains in a "Neutral" sentiment.Note: The threshold of the Fear Index is 0-100, and it encompasses the following indicators: Volatility (25%) + Market Trading Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin's share of the overall market (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: The Federal Reserve's probability of a rate cut in September is 83.1%.
item.description: On August 29th, based on CME's "FedWatch" data, the likelihood of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in September is 16.9%, while the probability of a 25-basis-point interest rate cut is 83.1%.

item.title: Bloomberg Analyst: U.S. Cryptocurrency ETF Registration Applications Now Reach 92
item.description: On August 29th, Bloomberg ETF analyst James Seyffart declared that currently, there are a grand total of 92 records of cryptocurrency ETP products that are either in the process of being filed or have been applied for in the United States.Note: The SEC had previously made public the listing standards for cryptocurrency ETPs. However, the majority of upcoming cryptocurrency products will adopt an ETF structure.

item.title: XPL Price Manipulation Nets $38.77 Million in Liquidation Profits, Whale Opens $31 Million XPL Long Position Through 15 Addresses Again
item.description: On August 29th, according to the monitoring of Delphi Digital, the day before yesterday, a whale achieved a profit of $38.77 million by manipulating XPL liquidation. It has recently been gradually dispersing the profit funds to more than 20 addresses. Subsequently, some of the funds were re-deposited into Hyperliquid to leverage 1x long XPL.Currently, they have opened at least 15 positions with 1x leverage to go long on XPL, with a total position value of $31 million and an average entry price of approximately $0.7.The total combined long and short positions for XPL on Hyperliquid is currently around $80 million, indicating that the vast majority of the XPL long positions are held by this whale.

item.title: A new address withdrew 408,557 UNI from Binance, worth approximately $4 million
item.description: On August 29th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet withdrew 408,557 UNI from Binance, with a value of approximately $4 million.This wallet has not yet withdrawn the ETH needed for transaction fees to facilitate further operations.

item.title: Coinbase Former CTO: Bitcoin Will Replace Real Estate as the Primary Store of Value
item.description: On August 29th, according to CoinDesk, Balaji Srinivasan, who was formerly the CTO of Coinbase, claimed that Bitcoin will take the place of real estate as the primary means of storing value, and homes and apartments will only be used for practical purposes such as residence.

item.title: Bloomberg: Coinbase Rapidly Emerging as Bitcoin Miners' Top Lender
item.description: On August 29th, as reported by Bloomberg, cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global Inc. is leading the trend of providing loans to crypto miners by using Bitcoin as collateral for recovery.Coinbase is rapidly emerging as one of the largest lenders to U.S. Bitcoin mining companies. The exchange platform is widely recognized for its trading and custody businesses. However, it has now extended hundreds of millions of dollars in credit to companies like Riot Platforms, CleanSpark, and most recently, Hut 8, filling the gap left by the closure of most crypto lenders in 2022.
